sen.e: He studied in Goguryeo (kingdom of Korea), and after coming back to Japan, he lived in Gango-ji Temple (Asuka-dera Temple).

sen.j: 650年（白雉元年）穴戸国（後の長門国）の国司が白雉を献上した際に、天皇の諮問に回答して祥瑞であることを上奏した。
sen.e: In 650 when Kokushi (provincial governor) of Anato Province (later Nagato Province) recommended "Hakuchi" as a new gengo (era name), Doto in response to the inquiry of the emperor reported that the name was shonzui (a good omen).

sen.j: 白雉に改元されることとなった。
sen.e: Based on this report, Hakuchi was adopted as a new name of the era.
